Visit http://www.campchef.com/deluxe-stainless-bbq-grill-box-90-accessory.html

Grilling Chicken Cordon Bleu on the new Stainless Steel Professional Barbecue box from Camp Chef.  A fun and easy way to make a delicious sandwich.  Visit www.campchef.com for more tips, tricks and fun grilling recipes for your summer grilling fun.
